key_points: Tiger Woods expresses gratitude to fellow golfers for their support following a serious car accident.
Golfers Rory Mcllroy, Justin Thomas, and others wore Woods' signature red shirt and black pants in tribute during the WGC-Workday Championship.
Woods was touched by the gesture, stating it helps him through this difficult time.
Collin Morikawa won the WGC-Workday Championship and acknowledged Woods in his victory speech.
Woods suffered a single-vehicle accident in Rancho Palos Verdes, California.
The accident involved Woods' car hitting a sign, shearing through a tree, and flipping over.
Woods had to be extricated from the vehicle by first responders due to major damage.
He underwent emergency surgery for significant orthopedic injuries to his right lower extremity.
Following the initial surgery, Woods had follow-up procedures at Cedars-Sinai.
Sources indicate Woods has a long recovery ahead but remain optimistic about his recovery.
spokespersons: Dr. Anish Mahajan (Chief Medical Officer, Harbor-UCLA Medical Center)
